features: REPLENISHING MOISTURIZER: Our restoring body lotion works to restore skin's natural barrier for soft & supple looking skin, while providing all day moisture.
GREASE FREE FORMULA: Formulated with omega fatty acids, shea butter, B vitamins & sodium PCA, this lotion moisturizes skin & absorbs quickly with no greasy residue.

BIOCOMPATIBLE & SAFE: Naturium skincare is formulated with both potent natural ingredients & advanced synthetic ingredients. They utilize efficacious levels of active ingredients, are pH level appropriate, & are thoroughly tested for safety.

CLEAN FORMULATION, NON-TOXIC: Cruelty free, paraben free, vegan, gluten free, fragrance free & non-toxic. Made with the highest-quality botanical, earth & marine-based ingredients combined with non-toxic-to-skin alternatives & advanced science.
NATURIUM QUALITY GUARANTEE: If for any reason you are not 100% satisfied, we offer a 30-day money-back refund. No questions asked!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bio-Lipid Restoring Moisturizing Body Lotion The Brightener Vitamin C Body Wash The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Hydrating Body Wash The Multi-Vitamin Daily Nutrients Body Wash Cream Serum 0.05% Key Ingredients Omega fatty acids, shea butter, B vitamins and sodium PCA Ascorbyl glucoside, a highly stable vitamin C derivative, bioactive fruit acids and enzymes Over 50% glycerin, a blend of linoleic-rich oils and plant-derived squalane Mild, plant-based surfactants Key Benefits Helps replenish skin’s natural barrier for softer, smoother, and more supple looking skin Helps visually brighten the skin and removes dirt, oil, and other impurities Leaves skin visibly nourished, hydrated and glowing without stripping the skin of essential moisture Removes dirt, oil, and other impurities, while helping energize and maintain healthier-looking skin Usage PM, can be used 3 times per week As needed. Can be followed with Bio-Lipid Lotion As needed. Can be followed with Bio-Lipid Lotion As needed. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ten Stars! AMAZING For Dry Itchy Skin!!
reviews.reviewText: This is an incredible product of very HIGH quality.I have used numerous products for dry itchy skin and none were very effective. I researched products for itchy skin and this lotion had good reviews so I gave it a try.It is incredible. It blends into your skin extremely well. It’s not oily or greasy and feels fantastic on your skin. It feels penetrative. There is no scent which I’m not used to. It’s understandable that Naturium would omit fragrance as some scents can be irritating to the skin.I also purchased the shower cleanser which I haven’t tried yet. I will review as soon as I use it.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Creamy, medium density cream with pleasant scent. Feels light on the skin, absorbs quickly with no lingering scent. Another nice Naturium product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m very particular when it comes to body lotions and this is the best one I’ve tried. Its so hydrating, it absorbs quickly and it makes your skin so soft. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy and it doesn’t irritate my skin because it’s unscented. Usually I’ll get a rash or bumps from body products with fragrance or other drying or irritating ingredients but this one doesn’t make my skin itchy or break out in a rash. 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about it. Light. Not greasy. Excellent moisturizing. No scent. Good for sensitive skin. I use it on body and face. 10/10 will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Favorite All Over Moisturizer EVER
reviews.reviewText: This is such a rich, moisturizing and replenishing lotion. Unscented which is a plus, and has lasted me a very long time!Will purchase again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super silky and hydrating without making me feel greasy or oily. Truly fragrance free for those with sensitive skin or sense of smell. Easy to work into your skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for nourishing your skin
reviews.reviewText: Tried this lotion for the first time last night and boy is it nice!! Smooth and creamy, soaks right in. Takes away that crepey look. Not a heavy feeling lotion either. Will be my new body lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rich but pump doesn't work at 1/3 left
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good. Rich. Very thick and creamy. Long lasting. Won't buy again though because when the bottle is 2/3 down, pump no longer works and I have to unscrew the top to tap it out.
